column1: ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT is a service of Deutsche Post Direkt for validating address data.
column2: ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT is a service of Deutsche Post Direkt for validating address data.

column1: Address validation can be performed either manually or automatically after the order was placed.
column2: Address validation can be performed either manually or automatically after the order was placed.

column1: Automatically put on hold orders that are undeliverable, possibly deliverable, or that failed analysis.
column2: Automatically put on hold orders that are undeliverable, possibly deliverable, or that failed analysis.

column1: Automatically update order shipping addresses with ADDRESSFACTORY suggestions.
column2: Automatically update order shipping addresses with ADDRESSFACTORY suggestions.

column1: Basis for this check is the postal reference file from Deutsche Post Direkt.
column2: Basis for this check is the postal reference file from Deutsche Post Direkt.

column1: Beware: Log level Debug will result in large log files.
column2: Beware: Log level Debug will result in large log files.

column1: Could not apply ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT address suggestion for order.
column2: Could not apply ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT address suggestion for order.

column1: Could not perform ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT analysis for order.
column2: Could not perform ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT analysis for order.

column1: Could not update order address with ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT suggestion.
column2: Could not update order address with ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT suggestion.

column1: Enter the name of the desired synchronization configuration that you have received from Deutsche Post Direkt.
column2: Enter the name of the desired synchronization configuration that you have received from Deutsche Post Direkt.

column1: If you want to assign the API requests of this module to a specific client, enter the username of the client here.
column2: If you want to assign the API requests of this module to a specific client, enter the username of the client here.

column1: Only use the option "Analysis on order placement" if problems occur in connection with "Analysis via Cron".
column2: Only use the option "Analysis on order placement" if problems occur in connection with "Analysis via Cron".

column1: Order address updated with ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT suggestion.
column2: Order address updated with ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT suggestion.

column1: Order(s) %s could not be analysed with ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT.
column2: Order(s) %s could not be analysed with ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT.

column1: The address will be checked with regards to the format of the address (zipcode, street and city) as well as the probability of a successful delivery to the person at this address.
column2: The address will be checked with regards to the format of the address (zipcode, street and city) as well as the probability of a successful delivery to the person at this address.

column1: This database is unique in Germany with around 210 million current and former private addresses for validating purposes.
column2: This database is unique in Germany with around 210 million current and former private addresses for validating purposes.

column1: This module integrates ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT services into Magento so that you can check the customer’s shipping address before fulfilling the order.
column2: This module integrates ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT services into Magento so that you can check the customer’s shipping address before fulfilling the order.

column1: You must also have Magento general logging enabled. Attention: Logs can contain sensitive customer data! Logging should only be activated for troubleshooting purposes. The logs should be deleted regularly.
column2: You must also have Magento general logging enabled. Attention: Logs can contain sensitive customer data! Logging should only be activated for troubleshooting purposes. The logs should be deleted regularly.

column1: You need a valid Deutsche Post Direkt account. If you do not have an account yet or your account is not enabled for ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT, please use the Deutsche Post Direkt website to use our address solutions.
column2: You need a valid Deutsche Post Direkt account. If you do not have an account yet or your account is not enabled for ADDRESSFACTORY DIRECT, please use the Deutsche Post Direkt website to use our address solutions.
